description: When this is activated, the workspace thumbnails are removed from overview.

There are some great keyboard shortcuts for moving between workspaces, as well as moving the active window between workspaces. I use these often, so I was very disappointed when this extension killed these keyboard shortcuts.
summary: Killed the keyboard shortcuts to change workspace

description: All shortcuts broken. Search bar stopped working after installation. Cannot remove this extension..
summary: Aweful. Wasted my time to tweaking gnome back

description: Didn't want it and can't remove it. Please fix
summary: Didn't want it and can't remove it

description:
All of a sudden.... no workspaces? Up/Down... workspaces gone. Productivity gone. Oh sure, change things from up down to left right. 

Then...dig in and find this little tick of a program. What did it do? Why is it here? What installed it?
